sect1.title: Compatible Operating Systems
sect1.para:
RCE releases are provided for Windows and Linux. It is regularly tested on
CentOS 7
Debian 8
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop ("SLED") 12 SP2
Windows 7
Windows 10
Windows Server 2012 R2
It is also confirmed to run (but not as thoroughly tested) on
Mint 18
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop ("SLED") 11 SP2
Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
openSUSE Leap 42.1
Windows 8.1

sect2.title: Support of 32 Bit Operating Systems
sect2.para: Starting with release 8.0.0, RCE is only shipped for 64 bit systems. If you still require 32 bit packages, you can continue to use previous RCE releases, but there will be no standard feature or bugfix updates for them.

sect3.title: KDE on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
sect3.para: On Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 with KDE 4, RCE (like any other Eclipse-based application) can cause a segmentation fault at startup. If you encounter such an issue, you can try choosing a different GTK2 theme:

listitem.para: Switch the GTK2 theme to "Raleigh" or "Adwaita" and click on Apply

sect3.title: KDE with Oxygen
sect3.para: On Unix Systems using KDE as desktop environment and Oxygen as theme it can happen that RCE crashes when certain GUI elements are shown. It is a known issue in the theme Oxygen and happens on other Eclipse-based applications as well. If you encounter such an issue, please choose a different theme like "Raleigh" or "Adwaita".

sect3.title: Jython scripts are executed sequentially
sect3.para: The Script component can use Jython for the evaluation of scripts and the pre- and postprocessing of integrated tools always uses Jython. Due to a known bug in the Jython implementation it is not possible to execute several Jython instances in parallel. Therefore, the execution will be done sequentially. If several Script components should be executed in parallel, Python should be used instead.

sect3.title: 32-bit Java is not supported
sect3.para: Running RCE with a 32-bit Java Runtime Environment doesn't work. On some operating systems an error dialog will be displayed in this case, on some other systems nothing will happen at all. Therefore, always make sure a 64-bit Java Runtime Environment is used to run RCE.
